inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('Movement', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addArmorBonus('Medium', 'MovementPenalty', 'Stackable', 40); effect.getBonuses().addArmorBonus('Heavy', 'MovementPenalty', 'Stackable', 40); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Athletic
description: You are able to run faster, especially in heavier armor.  You gain a +10 general movement bonus, and also ignore 40% of any movement penalty due to medium or heavy armor.
